It serves to warn her about something she is doing in life and needs to stop and return to God. If the available father gives her money, this is evidence of abundant sustenance. A married woman sees in her dream that her father comes back to life sick and recovers. Quickly. This indicates that she will move to a new place that suits her. title: Interpretation of the big snake in a dream by Ibn Sirin, the big yellow snake in a dream, and the dream interpretation of the big black snake in a dream

preview.html: A large snake in a dream is one of the dreams that causes fear and panic to the dreamer because it is a reptile that brings death to people because of the poison it contains, and seeing it indicates those evil people who only care about harming and destroying others. Their lives, and there are many interpretations that we will learn about through the lines. The great snake in a dream by Ibn SirinThe great snake in a dream Seeing it in a young man’s dream is a warning sign to be careful of what is going on around him and of his friends who he believes are loyal to him, and at the same time they are planning for him and wishing him harm.Interpretation Dreaming of a large snake means that there is serious enmity between the monarch and another person, and he must warn him in that particular period, and try to protect himself from its evils. If she finds herself fighting this snake and defeating it, then it is fortunate that she will fulfill a desire dear to her heart, despite the difficulties and challenges she faced. Which you encountered. If he sees him coming out of a hole and running in front of him, then the dreamer should ask his Lord for forgiveness, try to do good, and avoid evil as much as possible until he comes out. With his life from the darkness of misery and misery to the light of hope and happiness. One of the positive elements in the dream is that this snake appears in red, which means that goodness is coming and fears will fade away, and if there are debts that must be paid, he will be able to do so. The great snake in a dream according to Ibn Sirin The dreamer's condition with this snake. If he sees in a dream that he is pulling his teeth and spitting poison out of his mouth, this is evidence that he has great experience and great wisdom that will help him reach the top and direct him on the right path to move forward in life. . And he rises to his mission. But if he sees him running after him, there is a strong competitor in the field of business or a colleague at work who does not like him and is setting traps for him to trap him and divert him from his path. He also said that it may be a sign for the woman who was deprived of pregnancy and childbirth that there is hope again that... Her desire to be the mother of a beautiful child will come true. Once you enter the Egyptian Dream Interpretation website from Google, you will find all the dream interpretations you are looking for. The big snake in the dream of an unmarried woman. It is the betrayal and treachery that the girl is exposed to by a person who represents her love and affection and who has intentions and purposes far from that. She must be careful and she does not need this connection. Interpretation of a dream about a large snake for a single woman: If it infects her with poison and spreads throughout her body, this is a sign that she is already a victim of that person, and she later feels intense remorse. If she finds herself in a state of panic, she is most likely falling short of her Creator and her Return and repent to her Lord until she obtains His satisfaction and devotes herself to good deeds. It was also said that if the snake was killed under the girl’s feet in a dream, this is a sign that she is ambitious and will achieve what she wants, no matter how difficult it is. But if it is a huge snake and its color is white, then it is good news for her to marry a young man. It is wonderful to live a life of luxury and love with him. A large snake in a dream for a married woman. Imam Ibn Sirin said: A married woman and the presence of a large snake in her life is evidence

title: Interpretation of seeing a bull in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: In the following paragraphs, we explain to you the interpretation of seeing a bull in a dream according to the interpretation of the great scholar Ibn Sirin. Sometimes the sleeper sees this animal in his dream and resorts to the interpretation of scholars to explain his vision, and scholars say that this vision varies depending on the state of the sleeping person, and it also varies according to the state of the animal that the sleeper saw. His dream, and that is why we will show you in the next article from the Encyclopedia of Interpretation of a Dream of Seeing a Bull in a Dream for a Single Girl, a Married Woman, or a Pregnant Woman. Interpretation of Seeing a Bull in a DreamInterpretation of Seeing a Bull in a Dream by Ibn Sirin The great scholar Ibn Sirin believes that seeing a bull in a dream indicates a great position and a high position in society. If the sleeper sees in his dream a large herd of bulls, this is a good vision that indicates that he will assume an important position. Interpretation of seeing a bull in a dream for a single woman. If an unmarried girl sees a white bull in her dream, this is a vision that indicates her success in her coming days. Seeing a black bull indicates In a dream, it indicates her marriage to a strong and powerful man. As for an unmarried girl who sees a red bull in her dream, this is a vision that indicates her marriage to a rich and wealthy man. But if an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is running away from a bull, this is a sign that she refuses marriage. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream the bravado of a bull, then this is a good vision that indicates the approaching date of her wedding. But if she sees in a dream that a bull is chasing her, then this dream indicates her pain in her life. Interpretation of seeing a bull in a dream for a married womanIf a married woman sees a bull in her dream and it catches fire The bull, this is a sign of her attachment to her husband and she cannot live without him. An obedient, calm and obedient bull in a married woman’s dream indicates that her husband alienates her and that this vision is not good and may indicate the emergence of marital problems and the instability of her life. If a married woman hears images of a bull in a dream and it is high This is a good vision that bodes well for her. Seeing a bull hunting in a married woman’s dream means that God will impregnate her in the near future. Seeing a bull in a dream for a pregnant woman Interpretation scholars believe that seeing a bull in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates that God Almighty will give birth to a male for her. The vision also indicates an easy and trouble-free birth. If a pregnant woman sees in her dream a bull, a cow and a calf in the same vision, then this is a good dream that promises her a good friend, a lot of money and that she will fulfill her desire. Always seek and pray to God with. Interpretation of dreams of a bull chasing me. If the sleeper sees in his dream that a bull is chasing him, then this vision shows that he is following his desires and having a lot of fun in his life, and he must repent for the sins he has committed and come back. His senses. But if the dreamer competes in his dream with the revolution, this is a sign of the dreamer’s striving for success. Seeing a bull chasing in a dream may mean that the dreamer will follow the wrong advice from the wrong people. Shooting a bull in a dream Seeing a bull in a dream for an unmarried girl indicates an imminent appointment For her marriage. If a married woman sees that a bull is beating her, this vision indicates that she will become pregnant soon.

title: Interpretation of seeing a balcony in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a balcony in a dream. Through these lines, we present to you the interpretation of seeing a balcony in a dream, or as it is known as a balcony. Many of us usually see the balcony wall falling or see it without a wall, and through it we explain to you all the interpretations about seeing a balcony in a dream by Al-Nabulsi and Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing a balcony in a dream. Balcony in a dream Seeing a balcony in a dream brings many visions and interpretations, referring to many signs and signs that everyone should know, especially since it is one of the most important things in every home. It gives the house a beautiful and attractive view, especially if it faces vast areas or green spaces. Interpretations of a dream about a balcony often differ, as some see that he is standing on it, others see that he is falling, and there are those who see that he is sleeping on it, and each one has a meaning and we will explain this. For you through the following paragraph. Interpretation of seeing a balcony in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin says that there are many interpretations and connotations of seeing a balcony in a dream, which must be identified and interpreted correctly. If you see the city wall being the highest, this is evidence of the ruler or ruler, and the balconies appear The ruler’s followers and servants, and if the wall is money, then the balconies are the guards at night, and if the wall is property, then the balconies are weapons and ammunition. Ibn Sirin explained that seeing a balcony in a dream indicates the dreamer’s success and superiority in his life for a very short period, and that someone is planning some tricks for you. If the balcony is in light colors and full of roses and flowers, this means the dreamer’s honor, and the balcony in a dream usually shows some damage and problems that the dreamer faces in his life. A man who sees it in a dream indicates unpleasant news, while urinating on the balcony indicates that a lot of... Food comes to you, and the dreamer seeing water on the balcony indicates that someone is trying to cause a disturbance in your life. Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing a married woman opening the balcony as an indication that she will move to a new house or buy a new car. You do not recognize him on the balcony, this is evidence of many problems and troubles that he will suffer from in life. Interpretation of the dream of the balcony according to NabulsiImam Al-Nabulsi explained that a person seeing the balcony in a dream, leaning and feeling tense and fearful, and if it is spacious and clean, this indicates that the dreamer enjoys a prestigious position. Among people and if he sees himself. Sleeping on the balcony indicates that he will receive a lot of money and money during the coming season. Standing on the balcony saying goodbye to one of his friends is evidence that there is bad news on his way for someone he loves. The balcony in the dream is evidence of some new obligations or the emergence of some fluctuations in the future, and perhaps conclusively, it usually indicates the arrival of unpleasant news for some absent friends. We hope We have provided you, through these lines, with everything you are looking for about seeing a balcony in a dream, as well as complete interpretations and associations, and we have answered all the questions that are on your mind about this topic, especially since this vision is a confused vision.

title: Interpretation of dreams about graves and cemeteries: seeing open graves in a dream

preview.html: Seeing the graves of an unmarried woman, a pregnant woman, or a divorced woman, or dreaming of digging an open grave, walking between the graves, and seeing my grave being dug by Ibn Sirin for the grave of Imam al-Sadiq and others. Interpretation of graves in a dream: Whoever sees graves in a dream, the grave in general, the grave often symbolizes imprisonment. He saw graves in a dream and dreamed that he was placed in the grave or buried, then the dream symbolizes that its owner will be imprisoned in prison. If he dies in this grave, then the dream indicates his demise or destruction due to sorrows, worries and misfortunes. Whoever sees in a dream and dreams that someone, whether He was a sultan or a prince, and he placed him in the dug grave. The dream is an indication of imprisonment and imprisonment as well. If he sees himself not perishing in the grave, he will escape from his prison. Whoever sees in a dream and dreams that he was buried in the grave by an act, then the dream shows the corruption of religion to whoever sees it. The grave in a dream, then he comes out of the grave safe and sound, this indicates that the dreamer will repent to God Almighty. Whoever sees in a dream and dreams that he is digging dirt or throwing dirt on the buried, then the dreamer will be the cause of death and hardship for the buried. Who in the dream or dream opens the grave? Or it opens in a cemetery or cemetery, so the dream indicates prison and imprisonment. Whoever sees that he visits cemeteries and repeats the visit, inspects the graves, visits the prison, and examines the inmates there. Whoever sees in a dream and dreams that he entered an area in which he found many graves whose owners he does not know. Upon seeing the unknown and abandoned cemetery in a certain area, he tends to People in that region are hypocritical. If he sees in a dream a single grave whose owner is unknown, then the dreamer will be mixed with extravagance. Whoever sees in his dream or dream that he built it or found a grave on the roof of his house, the dream shows that he works a lot and lives a lot. Seeing graves pouring water and rain is a sign of It is good to come to the owner of the grave if he knows that the graves are located in a place that produces water and goodness, then this is evidence of the abundance of goodness for the people of the area. Famous graves indicate real things, so if he sees in a dream and dreams that he is digging for himself or preparing a grave, then in reality he is building a house. Carrying Digging graves has a new meaning and connotations for good, and it also has a bad meaning. If the excavation is for the grave of one of the great scholars, then whoever sees himself digging is a sign of knowledge and jurisprudence, following in the footsteps of the predecessors and their influence, and reviving and renewing his knowledge. If the exhumator finds a corpse or worn out and torn clothes, or sees... The bones of the deceased are dislocated and broken during the exhumation of the body. If the dream indicates that the digger or the one who dug the grave has become a heresy and a violation of the Sunnah. Whoever sees in a dream and dreams that he is digging and searching for the Prophet, may God bless him and grant him peace, will enter the grave and find him alive. The dream indicates the goodness that the digger has attained. Or one who digs a grave in order to revive the Sunnah. Whoever dreams in a dream and dreams that he is digging the grave of an infidel, heresy, or non-Muslim, then the dreamer has leaned toward the doctrines of the people of falsehood and deception. Whoever sees in a dream and dreams that he is digging the grave of one of the infidels or non-Muslims, as we mentioned, will find the body of the dead person and his clothes. Worn, so the meaning becomes more certain in observing corruption. Interpretation of seeing a grave in a dream could be

title: Interpretation of the big snake in a dream by Ibn Sirin, the big yellow snake in a dream, and the dream interpretation of the big black snake in a dream

preview.html: A large snake in a dream is one of the dreams that causes fear and panic to the dreamer because it is a reptile that brings death to people because of the poison it contains, and seeing it indicates those evil people who only care about harming and destroying others. Their lives, and there are many interpretations that we will learn about through the lines. The great snake in a dream by Ibn SirinThe great snake in a dream Seeing it in a young man’s dream is a warning sign to be careful of what is going on around him and of his friends who he believes are loyal to him, and at the same time they are planning for him and wishing him harm.Interpretation Dreaming of a large snake means that there is serious enmity between the monarch and another person, and he must warn him in that particular period, and try to protect himself from its evils. If she finds herself fighting this snake and defeating it, then it is fortunate that she will fulfill a desire dear to her heart, despite the difficulties and challenges she faced. Which you encountered. If he sees him coming out of a hole and running in front of him, then the dreamer should ask his Lord for forgiveness, try to do good, and avoid evil as much as possible until he comes out. With his life from the darkness of misery and misery to the light of hope and happiness. One of the positive elements in the dream is that this snake appears in red, which means that goodness is coming and fears will fade away, and if there are debts that must be paid, he will be able to do so. The great snake in a dream according to Ibn Sirin The dreamer's condition with this snake. If he sees in a dream that he is pulling his teeth and spitting poison out of his mouth, this is evidence that he has great experience and great wisdom that will help him reach the top and direct him on the right path to move forward in life. . And he rises to his mission. But if he sees him running after him, there is a strong competitor in the field of business or a colleague at work who does not like him and is setting traps for him to trap him and divert him from his path. He also said that it may be a sign for the woman who was deprived of pregnancy and childbirth that there is hope again that... Her desire to be the mother of a beautiful child will come true. Once you enter the Egyptian Dream Interpretation website from Google, you will find all the dream interpretations you are looking for. The big snake in the dream of an unmarried woman. It is the betrayal and treachery that the girl is exposed to by someone who represents her love and affection and who has intentions and purposes far from that. She must be careful and she does not need this connection. Interpretation of a dream about a large snake for a single woman: If it infects her with poison and spreads throughout her body, this is a sign that she is already a victim of that person, and she later feels intense remorse. If she finds herself in a state of panic, she is most likely falling short of her Creator and her Return and repent to her Lord until she obtains His satisfaction and devotes herself to good deeds. It was also said that if the snake was killed under the girl’s feet in a dream, this is a sign that she is ambitious and will achieve what she wants, no matter the difficulty. But if it is a huge snake and its color is white, then it is good news for her to marry a young man. It is wonderful to live a life of luxury and love with him. A large snake in a dream for a married woman. Imam Ibn Sirin said: A married woman and the presence of a large snake in her life is evidence

If the sleeper sees in his dream a large herd of bulls, this is a good vision that indicates that he will assume an important position. Interpretation of seeing a bull in a dream for a single woman. If an unmarried girl sees a white bull in her dream, this is a vision that indicates her success in her coming days. Seeing a black bull indicates In a dream, it indicates her marriage to a strong and powerful man. As for an unmarried girl who sees a red bull in her dream, this is a vision that indicates her marriage to a rich and wealthy man. But if an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is running away from a bull, this is a sign that she refuses marriage. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream the bravado of a bull, then this is a good vision that indicates the approaching date of her wedding. But if she sees in a dream that a bull is chasing her, then this dream indicates her pain in her life. Interpretation of seeing a bull in a dream for a married womanIf a married woman sees a bull in her dream and it catches fire The bull, this is a sign of her attachment to her husband and she cannot live without him. An obedient, calm and obedient bull in a married woman’s dream indicates that her husband alienates her and that this vision is not good and may indicate the emergence of marital problems and the instability of her life. If a married woman hears images of a bull in a dream and it is high This is a good vision that bodes well for her. Seeing a bull hunting in a married woman’s dream means that God will impregnate her in the near future. The vision also indicates an easy and trouble-free birth. If a pregnant woman sees in her dream a bull, a cow and a calf in the same vision, then this is a good dream that promises her a good friend, a lot of money and that she will fulfill her desire. Always strive and pray to God with. Interpretation of dreams of a bull chasing me. His senses. But if the dreamer competes in his dream with the revolution, this is a sign of the dreamer’s striving for success. Seeing a bull chasing in a dream may mean that the dreamer will follow the wrong advice from the wrong people. Shooting a bull in a dream Seeing a bull in a dream for an unmarried girl indicates an imminent appointment For her marriage. If a married woman sees that a bull is beating her, this vision indicates that she will become pregnant soon.

title: Interpretation of seeing a balcony in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a balcony in a dream. Through these lines, we present to you the interpretation of seeing a balcony in a dream, or as it is known as a balcony. Many of us usually see the balcony wall falling or see it without a wall, and through it we explain to you all the interpretations about seeing a balcony in a dream by Al-Nabulsi and Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing a balcony in a dream. Balcony in a dream Seeing a balcony in a dream brings many visions and interpretations, referring to many signs and signs that everyone should know, especially since it is one of the most important things in every home. It gives the house a beautiful and attractive view, especially if it faces vast areas or green spaces. Interpretations of a dream about a balcony often differ, as some see that he is standing on it, others see that he is falling, and there are those who see that he is sleeping on it, and each one has a meaning and we will explain this. For you through the following paragraph. Interpretation of seeing a balcony in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin says that there are many interpretations and connotations of seeing a balcony in a dream, which must be identified and interpreted correctly. If you see the city wall being the highest, this is evidence of the ruler or governor, and the balconies appear The ruler’s followers and servants, and if the wall is money, then the balconies are the guards at night, and if the wall is property, then the balconies are weapons and ammunition. Ibn Sirin explained that seeing a balcony in a dream indicates the dreamer’s success and superiority in his life for a very short period, and that someone is planning some tricks for you. If the balcony is in light colors and full of roses and flowers, this means the dreamer’s honor, and the balcony in a dream usually shows some damage and problems that the dreamer faces in his life. A man who sees it in a dream indicates unpleasant news, while urinating on the balcony indicates that a lot of... Food comes to you, and the dreamer seeing water on the balcony indicates that someone is trying to cause a disturbance in your life. Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing a married woman opening the balcony as an indication that she will move to a new house or buy a new car. You do not recognize him on the balcony, this is evidence of many problems and troubles that he will suffer from in life. Interpretation of the dream of the balcony according to NabulsiImam Al-Nabulsi explained that a person seeing the balcony in a dream, leaning and feeling tense and fearful, and if it is spacious and clean, this indicates that the dreamer enjoys a prestigious position. Among people and if he sees himself. Sleeping on the balcony indicates that he will receive a lot of money and money during the coming season. Standing on the balcony saying goodbye to one of his friends is evidence that there is bad news on his way for someone he loves. The balcony in the dream is evidence of some new obligations or the emergence of some fluctuations in the future, and perhaps conclusively, it usually indicates the arrival of unpleasant news for some absent friends. We hope We have provided you, through these lines, with everything you are looking for about seeing a balcony in a dream, as well as complete interpretations and associations, and we have answered all the questions that are on your mind about this topic, especially since this vision is a confused vision.

title: Interpretation of seeing a lover in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a lover in a dream, and seeing a lover is a pleasant thing, and in the interpretation of seeing a lover in a dream, there are many interpretations, some of which are worthy of praise and vice versa. The subconscious mind, which is busy thinking about her lover, believes that this interpretation applies to all cases. Interpretation of seeing a lover in a single woman’s dream: Perhaps a dream about him indicates that he does not know the fate of the relationship between them, and this worries her greatly because she faces the unknown future. If a girl sees her lover in a dream and their relationship has ended, this indicates Also, she constantly thinks about him and cannot live a normal life without him. She must face the truth, look to her future and expect compensation from God. Interpretation of seeing a lover in a dream for a married woman When a married woman sees her lover in a dream, this means that she is thinking about her ex-lover and that she is dissatisfied with her life with her husband. It could indicate the problems that exist between her and her husband and the dream shows that this woman will face many problems because she does not care about her home and her husband and she must be careful and close to her husband. And resolving their differences. Interpretation of seeing a pregnant woman in a dream about a pregnant woman. If a pregnant woman sees her lover in a dream, this is evidence of her constant thinking and preoccupation with her old lover and indicates that she will face problems in her life. Seeing her in the arms of her lover shows her betrayal and she must see things differently. When she sees In a dream that she does not leave her lover, this indicates that she is trying all the ways that lead to her ex-lover and that she is loyal to her husband and shows her dissatisfaction with the husband with whom she lives. . Interpretation of seeing a lover in a dream after separation. Seeing a lover in a dream after separation indicates that many changes will occur in the fortuneteller’s life, and perhaps the changes will be for the better or for the worse. And if he sees that he has a bottle of oil, then he takes some oil from it and anoints or anoints with it, then it rains or curses a liar or a gossip. title: Interpretation of dreams about graves and cemeteries: seeing open graves in a dream

preview.html: Seeing the graves of an unmarried woman, a pregnant woman, or a divorced woman, or a dream of digging an open grave, walking between the graves, and seeing my grave being dug by Ibn Sirin for the grave of Imam al-Sadiq and others. Interpretation of graves in a dream: Whoever sees graves in a dream, the grave in general, the grave often symbolizes imprisonment. He saw graves in a dream and dreamed that he was placed in the grave or buried, then the dream symbolizes that its owner will be imprisoned in prison. If he dies in this grave, then the dream indicates his demise or destruction due to sorrows, worries and misfortunes. Whoever sees in a dream and dreams that someone, whether He was a sultan or a prince, and he placed him in the dug grave. The dream is an indication of imprisonment and imprisonment as well. If he sees himself not perishing in the grave, he will escape from his prison. Whoever sees in a dream and dreams that he was buried in the grave by an act, then the dream shows the corruption of religion to whoever sees it. The grave in a dream, then he comes out of the grave safe and sound, this indicates that the dreamer will repent to God Almighty. Whoever sees in a dream and dreams that he is digging dirt or throwing dirt on the buried, then the dreamer will be the cause of death and hardship for the buried. Who in the dream or dream opens the grave? Or it opens in a cemetery or cemetery, so the dream indicates prison and imprisonment. Whoever sees that he visits cemeteries and repeats the visit, inspects the graves, visits the prison, and examines the inmates there. Whoever sees in a dream and dreams that he entered an area in which he found many graves whose owners he does not know. Upon seeing the unknown and abandoned cemetery in a certain area, he tends to People in that region are hypocritical. If he sees in a dream a single grave whose owner is unknown, then the dreamer will be mixed with extravagance. Whoever sees in his dream or dream that he built it or found a grave on the roof of his house, the dream shows that he works a lot and lives a lot. Seeing graves pouring water and rain is a sign of It is good to come to the owner of the grave if he knows that the graves are located in a place that produces water and goodness, then this is evidence of the abundance of goodness for the people of the area. Famous graves indicate real things, so if he sees in a dream and dreams that he is digging for himself or preparing a grave, then in reality he is building a house. Carrying Digging graves has a new meaning and connotations for good, and it also has a bad meaning. If the excavation is for the grave of one of the great scholars, then whoever sees himself digging is a sign of knowledge and jurisprudence, and he will follow in the footsteps of the predecessors and their influence, and revive and renew his knowledge. If the exhumator finds a corpse or worn out and torn clothes, or sees... The bones of the deceased are dislocated and broken during the exhumation of the body. If the dream indicates that the digger or the one who dug the grave has become a heresy and a violation of the Sunnah. Whoever sees in a dream and dreams that he is digging and searching for the Prophet, may God bless him and grant him peace, will enter the grave and find him alive. The dream indicates the goodness that the digger has attained. Or one who digs a grave in order to revive the Sunnah. Whoever dreams in a dream and dreams that he is digging the grave of an infidel, heresy, or non-Muslim, then the dreamer has leaned toward the doctrines of the people of falsehood and deception. Whoever sees in a dream and dreams that he is digging the grave of one of the infidels or non-Muslims, as we mentioned, will find the body of the dead person and his clothes. Worn, so the meaning becomes more certain in observing corruption. Interpretation of seeing a grave in a dream could be

title: Interpretation of a dream about a dead blind man according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing a blind dead person, or a blind dead person, or a blind person for an unmarried person, or for a married person, or for a pregnant woman, or for a divorced person, or for a man, I saw my blind father, or a blind son, or a blind grandfather, from the translator Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, and Imam Al-Sadiq, and more interpretations in continuation. Subject: Seeing a blind dead person in a dream. One of the dreams that we constantly see in our dreams, which causes us a great state of anxiety, fear and terror, is to obtain its correct interpretation and find out the reason for the vision that appeared to us in our dreams. Since blindness is one of the difficult things that a person goes through in general life, it is the loss of one of the most important blessings that God gives us sight, and a person can become blind at the beginning of his life. His birth or he may be exposed to a disease or accident that will cause him to lose his sight in public life, but if he sees it, the dreamer will feel a great state of anxiety and confusion in order to obtain its correct interpretation, as the commentator Ibn Sirin interprets it in his performance. Interpretation of dying blind in a dream Blindness in the dead indicates misguidance and wandering. And uncertainty, as they said that the known dead man appears blind or deaf, then in the interpretation it symbolizes an evil that the fortuneteller will end up with and it was said that it is a mistake or a sin. The dreamer of visions does not deserve to follow the blind dead man in a dream, because it indicates bad fate or an unlawful goal. The best thing in a dream is for a dead person to see him after he has been blinded, because in the interpretation it means the return of truth and the disappearance of falsehood or slander. Likewise, it is good for a fortune teller to treat a blind dead person so that he can see through a recipe or food that he offers to the dead person, such as fruit or a drink such as honey, water, or milk. A dead person is blind in a dream. It is evidence that the dreamer is performing some bad and illegal actions in public life, as it appears that he is taking a lot of prohibited money. Seeing blind dead people in a dream is evidence that the dreamer is far from the Islamic religion and does not want to recite the Qur’an and recite it in public life, and it appears that he has forgotten the teachings. Completely religious. Seeing a blind person in a dream means that he will suffer from some problems and will commit many sins in public life. Seeing the dreamer marrying a blind girl in a dream is evidence that he will face many problems and troubles in the near future. If a single man sees that he is blind in a dream, and returns If God gives his sight to him in a dream, this is evidence that he will marry soon, and she will be a woman of good morals and will make him very happy. While the sick person sees that he is blind in a dream and God has restored his sight again, this is evidence that he will soon be free of all diseases and will enjoy complete health and will enjoy Also in very strong health due to the sobriety of fate and destiny. Destiny. Seeing a dreamer suffering from financial problems while he is blind and that God has restored his sight in a dream is evidence that he will soon obtain cover and money and get rid of all his financial problems. Seeing an unmarried woman blind in a dream also means that she is suffering from thinking about the uncertain future that she is suffering from.
